page.title: 01The Survey Area.
page.content: The 12sq km block of this survey has no has major settlement. It includes the few houses of High Flats and Lower Denby. The villages of Birds Edge, Upper Denby and Ingbirchworth. Most people travel to Penistone, Denby Dale, Huddersfield or Barnsley for the services they need. The population of the area is about 1600. The land rises from about 800ft to over 1100 and is mostly used for agriculture. The 12sq km area is interesting because it is divided almost equally on a line north west to south east by the A629 Huddersfield to Sheffield road. Only a few farms are found to the south of this road. The other division east to west is between West Yorkshire (Kirklees) and South Yorkshire (Barnsley). Only one village Ingbirchworth is in South Yorkshire.
